She looks at her hand, slightly confused, as the magic she had intended to use on Player 26 is instead applied to herself. Her nerves got the better of her as she looked about, worried that their conversation had been shared with some random stranger that may or may not have been standing nearby, and is relieved that they appear to still be alone. "You're right, I am obviously overthinking things... thinking too far ahead." She suddenly thinks of something, maybe a trickle of confidence from deep within that just can't be oppressed by her season. "You... could maybe even try it, and who knows, come around to my thoughts. Find someone else to share your love with, and bring them back to me to share together..." She also knew deep down she could do the same, but firstly had made the promise to never do so to Player 26, and right now was baffled at the idea that she would ever have the audacity to openly flirt in such a manner that could lead to that situation.
